original_text:
Cornelius
Il nuovo gioco appena rilasciato da NetEnt ha come protagonista Cornelius, un gattone goloso che ripaga ogni prelibatezza con premi istantanei appetitosi!
Un gatto amante dei dolciumi
Quando ci troviamo davanti ad un gatto come Cornelius, non pensate ai cibi in scatola e croccantini, ma preparate piuttosto biscottini alla vaniglia e latte! E infatti il nuovo gioco firmato NetEnt è ambientato in una cucina vecchio stile, con un frigo verde acqua sulla destra e la ciotola rossa di Cornelius sulla parte sinistra. A pochi passi c’è il nostro simpatico micione arancione, con indosso una maglietta verde ormai troppo stretta per lui. Nella zampa, neanche a dirlo, il nostro amico stringe un biscotto e di tanto in tanto si gratta la pancia scoperta. La grafica è arricchita dalle animazioni e da uno stile che riprende quello dei cartoon rende, la musica di sottofondo è un simpatico motivato che ci tiene compagnia durante i nostri Spin.
Una griglia di gioco extra large e un ottimo RTP
La NetEnt ha deciso di puntare su una griglia classica 5×4 e con ben 1024 modi per vincere. La puntata minima per ogni Spin è di 0,20 €, che può essere portata sino a un massimo di 400 €. Si vince associando simboli adiacenti a partire dal rullo di sinistra e procedendo verso destra.
La volatilità è media e il valore RTP corrisponde al 96,04%.
Un gioco bonus davvero speciale
In Cornelius troviamo diversi simboli di valore diverso. Si va dalle classiche carte da gioco dal 10 all’asso per passare al giochino di pezza a forma di pesce, il barattolo del latte, la scatolina e Cornelius, che è anche il simbolo che vale di più.
Passando ai simboli Bonus, il più importante è il Cash Drop symbols, un piatto di biscotti che nel gioco base paga da 0,25 a 3 volte la scommessa. Se 3 di questi simboli atterrano sui rulli, allora si attiva la Cash Drop Feature. In pratica, ogni volta che compaiono simboli Cash Drop, essi regalano una vincita che va da 0,1 a 0,5 la scommessa. Inoltre, questi simboli cadono di una riga a ogni giro. Il contatore a destra è impostato su tre e ogni volta che appare un nuovo simbolo Cash Drop, il conteggio viene ripreso daccapo.
Il vaso con i biscotti è il nostro simbolo Scatter e se sui rulli ne atterrano tre o più, allora si attivano i Free Spins. Oltre alla funzione Cash Drop, abbiamo altri simboli speciali:

Up: muove tuti i simboli Cash Drop e moltiplicatori di una riga verso l’alto
Golden Up: Sposta i simboli nella riga più alta libera
Adder: Ha un valore impresso sopra e aumenta quello dei simboli alla fine del gioco bonus
Multiplier: moltiplica il valore dei simboli Cash Drop e dei moltiplicatori


Domande Frequenti 
Posso giocare senza spendere soldi?

Certamente! Abbiamo la possibilità di giocare in modalità Play for Fun, per prendere confidenza col gioco senza spendere nulla!



Esiste un simbolo Wild?

No, in questa slot abbiamo solo uno Scatter e un simbolo Cash Drop



Posso giocare anche su cellulare?

Certamente, Cornelius è disponibile sia per tablet che per smartphone, oltre naturalmente al pc

raw_translation.response:
Cornelius, the new game just released by NetEnt, features Cornelius, a gluttonous kitty who rewards every treat with appetizing instant prizes!
A cat, a lover of sweets
When we meet a cat like Cornelius, we don't think of canned food and kibble, but rather vanilla cookies and milk! And indeed, the new game signed by NetEnt is set in an old-fashioned kitchen, with a mint green fridge on the right and Cornelius' red bowl on the left. Just a few steps away is our friendly orange tabby, wearing a green shirt that's now too tight for him. In his paw, of course, our friend is holding a cookie and occasionally scratching his exposed belly. The graphics are enriched by animations and a style that draws on that of cartoons, while the background music is a cheerful tune that keeps us company during our spins.
An extra-large game grid and excellent RTP
NetEnt has opted for a classic 5x4 grid and 1024 ways to win. The minimum bet for each spin is €0.20, which can be increased to a maximum of €400. To win, players must match adjacent symbols starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding towards the right.
The volatility is medium and the RTP value is 96.04%.
A truly special bonus game
In Cornelius, we find different symbols of different values. These range from classic playing cards from 10 to ace to the fish-shaped toy, the milk jar, the little box, and Cornelius himself, who is also the highest-paying symbol.
As for the bonus symbols, the most important is the Cash Drop symbol, a plate of cookies that pays out from 0.25 to 3 times the bet in the base game. When 3 of these symbols land on the reels, the Cash Drop feature is activated. Essentially, every time Cash Drop symbols appear, they give a payout ranging from 0.1 to 0.5 the bet. Moreover, these symbols drop down by one row on each spin. The counter on the right is set to three and every time a new Cash Drop symbol appears, the counting starts over.
The jar with cookies is our Scatter symbol and if 3 or more land on the reels, the Free Spins are triggered. In addition to the Cash Drop feature, we have other special symbols:

Up: moves all Cash Drop symbols and multipliers up by one row
Golden Up: moves symbols to the top row for free
Adder: has a value printed on it and increases the value of symbols at the end of the bonus game
Multiplier: multiplies the value of Cash Drop symbols and multipliers


Frequently Asked Questions 
Can I play for free?

Certainly! We have the option to play in Play for Fun mode, to get familiar with the game without spending anything!

Is there a Wild symbol?

No, in this slot we only have a Scatter symbol and a Cash Drop symbol.

Can I also play on mobile?

Certainly, Cornelius is available for both tablets and smartphones, in addition to computers.

Review:
 
Gameplay features and mechanics

Cornelius by NetEnt is a slot game with a 5x4 grid and 1024 ways to win, featuring Cornelius the orange tabby cat who rewards every treat with cash prizes. Players can bet a minimum of €0.20 and up to a maximum of €400 per spin. To win, players must match adjacent symbols starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding towards the right. The game has medium volatility and an RTP value of 96.04%. Players can enjoy the game in Play for Fun mode to familiarize themselves before playing with real money.

Bet range and RTP value

The minimum bet for Cornelius is €0.20 and the maximum bet is €400 per spin. The game has a medium volatility and an RTP value of 96.04%.

Symbols and their values

Symbols in Cornelius include classic playing card symbols from 10 to ace, along with higher-paying symbols like a fish-shaped toy, a milk jar, a little box, and Cornelius himself, who is also the highest-paying symbol. The Scatter symbol is a jar of cookies, and landing 3 or more of these symbols triggers the Free Spins bonus game. The Cash Drop symbol is a plate of cookies, paying out from 0.25 to 3 times the bet in the base game. When three Cash Drop symbols land on the reels, the Cash Drop feature is activated. Other special symbols include the Up symbol that moves Cash Drop symbols and multipliers up by one row, a Golden Up symbol that moves symbols to the top row for free, an Adder symbol that increases the value of symbols at the end of the bonus game, and a Multiplier symbol that multiplies the value of Cash Drop symbols and multipliers. 

Special game features and bonuses

The Cash Drop feature in Cornelius is triggered when three Cash Drop symbols appear on the reels, paying out every time they appear and dropping down by one row on each spin. The Counter on the right is set to three and gets reset every time a new Cash Drop symbol appears. The game's Free Spins bonus is triggered by landing three or more Scatter symbols, awarding players with a predetermined number of free spins with a chance to win extra cash prizes. Other special symbols can appear during the Free Spins bonus game which can help increase the value of the symbols and multipliers.

Availability on different devices

Cornelius by NetEnt is available on both desktop and mobile devices, including tablets and smartphones.

Review: Cornelius, the new game just released by NetEnt, features Cornelius, a gluttonous kitty who rewards every treat with appetizing instant prizes!
A cat, a lover of sweets
When we meet a cat like Cornelius, we don't think of canned food and kibble, but rather vanilla cookies and milk! And indeed, the new game signed by NetEnt is set in an old-fashioned kitchen, with a mint green fridge on the right and Cornelius' red bowl on the left. Just a few steps away is our friendly orange tabby, wearing a green shirt that's now too tight for him. In his paw, of course, our friend is holding a cookie and occasionally scratching his exposed belly. The graphics are enriched by animations and a style that draws on that of cartoons, while the background music is a cheerful tune that keeps us company during our spins.
An extra-large game grid and excellent RTP
NetEnt has opted for a classic 5x4 grid and 1024 ways to win. The minimum bet for each spin is €0.20, which can be increased to a maximum of €400. To win, players must match adjacent symbols starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding towards the right.
The volatility is medium and the RTP value is 96.04%.
A truly special bonus game
In Cornelius, we find different symbols of different values. These range from classic playing cards from 10 to ace to the fish-shaped toy, the milk jar, the little box, and Cornelius himself, who is also the highest-paying symbol.
As for the bonus symbols, the most important is the Cash Drop symbol, a plate of cookies that pays out from 0.25 to 3 times the bet in the base game. When 3 of these symbols land on the reels, the Cash Drop feature is activated. Essentially, every time Cash Drop symbols appear, they give a payout ranging from 0.1 to 0.5 the bet. Moreover, these symbols drop down by one row on each spin. The counter on the right is set to three and every time a new Cash Drop symbol appears, the counting starts over.
The jar with cookies is our Scatter symbol and if 3 or more land on the reels, the Free Spins are triggered. In addition to the Cash Drop feature, we have other special symbols:

Up: moves all Cash Drop symbols and multipliers up by one row
Golden Up: moves symbols to the top row for free
Adder: has a value printed on it and increases the value of symbols at the end of the bonus game
Multiplier: multiplies the value of Cash Drop symbols and multipliers


Frequently Asked Questions 
Can I play for free?

Certainly! We have the option to play in Play for Fun mode, to get familiar with the game without spending anything!

Is there a Wild symbol?

No, in this slot we only have a Scatter symbol and a Cash Drop symbol.

Can I also play on mobile?

Certainly, Cornelius is available for both tablets and smartphones, in addition to computers.
